medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressive numbness and burning in both feet.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms reported for 6 months. No significant allodynia was noted and no change in muscle strength.
medical_history.family_history: Father had congestive heart failure; sister has lupus.
medical_history.social_history: Non-smoker; does not drink alcohol; commonly walks barefoot in the house.
